text: Ezɨ kɨ uabɨra uabɨ gɨnɨghnɨgha ghaze, bizir gumazir onganiba batozim, uaghan na bativam. Kamaghɨn, nan fofozir avɨrir kaba, manmaghɨn nan akuragham? Bar puvatɨgham. Egha kɨ uan navir averiamɨn aven kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, fofozir aghuim uaghan, an mɨngariba mongezɨ e dagh fozir puvatɨgha okam nɨghnɨsi.
